title: Increases number of withdrawal transactions from basic banking accounts for account holders over sixty years of age to twelve from eight
summary: Increases the minimum number of authorized withdrawal transactions at no charge from basic banking accounts for account holders sixty-five years of age or older from eight to twelve.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3315

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 24, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. CLARK, COLTON, GLICK, ORTIZ -- Multi-Sponsored by
         -- M. of A. BRENNAN, CYMBROWITZ, DINOWITZ, GOTTFRIED, V. LOPEZ, MAGEE,
         MAYERSOHN,  PERRY,  SWEENEY,  WRIGHT  -- read once and referred to the
         Committee on Banks

       AN ACT to amend the banking law, in relation to the number of withdrawal
         transactions from a basic banking account

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Paragraph (c) of subdivision 2 of section 14-f of the bank-
    2  ing  law,  as added by chapter 1 of the laws of 1994, is amended to read
    3  as follows:
    4    (c) eight withdrawal transactions FOR ACCOUNT HOLDERS UNDER SIXTY-FIVE
    5  YEARS OF AGE, AND TWELVE WITHDRAWAL  TRANSACTIONS  FOR  ACCOUNT  HOLDERS
    6  SIXTY-FIVE YEARS OF AGE OR OLDER, including those conducted at electron-
    7  ic  facilities, during any periodic cycle at no additional charge to the
    8  account holder; and
    9    S 2. This act shall take effect on the sixtieth  day  after  it  shall
   10  have become a law.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD06558-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law, in relation to the number of withdrawal transactions from a basic banking account
